title: Omnicom Group 's revenue 2006 to 2018
summary: Overall Revenue in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2007 to 2009, slightly increasing from 2009 to 2011, and lastly roughly constant from 2011 to 2017.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, of value 15.42 was reached at Year 2016
The lowest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, of value 11.72 was reported at Year 2009
